TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SimpleWorkerRequest extends System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest

summary.span: 提供 抽象类的简单实现，该抽象类可用于在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 应用程序之外承载 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the abstract class that can be used to host ASP.NET applications outside an Internet Information Services (IIS) application.

summary.span: 可以直接采用 ，也可以扩展它。

span.span: You can employ directly or extend it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种简单实现`HttpWorkerRequest`提供了请求 URL 和查询字符串，并捕获到输出正文。This simple implementation of `HttpWorkerRequest` provides the request URL and the query string and captures the body of the output into a . 若要实现更丰富的功能，例如提供已发布的内容和标头和捕获响应标头或响应正文作为二进制数据，应扩展`SimpleWorkerRequest`并重写相应`HttpWorkerRequest`方法。To achieve richer functionality, such as providing posted content and headers and capturing the response headers or response body as binary data, you should extend `SimpleWorkerRequest` and override the appropriate `HttpWorkerRequest` methods.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The virtual path to the application directory; for example, "/app".

param.name: appPhysicalDir

span.span: The physical path to the application directory; for example, "c:\app".

para.span: 使用 URL 进行访问控制或安全敏感性决策会将应用程序暴露在规范化安全漏洞之下。

span.span: Using the URL for access control, or security-sensitive decisions can expose your application to canonicalization security vulnerabilities.
